data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_dc4b821e49b904715172136017798da3.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Each time Lancelot charges, his damage is increased by 7.5% for 4s, up to 30%.

Lancelot charges in the target direction, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way and applying a <font color="a6aafb">Sword Mark</font> to the first unmarked enemy hit. The <font color="a6aafb">Sword Mark</font> lasts 5s.

If Lancelot successfully applies a <font color="a6aafb">Sword Mark</font> to an enemy, the skill's cooldown will be reset.

Lancelot strikes in the target direction 3 times, each time dealing 220<font color="fba51f"> (+130% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit (damage is reduced when multiple enemies are hit). He's untargetable and invincible during this process. Enemies in the center of the area take all the 3 hits and are slowed by 20% for 0.5s. The slow effect can stack.

After a short delay, Lancelot performs an executioner's strike in the target direction, dealing 350<font color="fba51f"> (+170% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit. He is invincible throughout the process.

data.name: Lancelot

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Balanced CD Reduction and penetration.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover <%Num1> of Lost HP and gain <%Num2> Movement Speed.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equiptips:
+160 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equiptips:
+160 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:

Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

recommendmasterplan.name: Kiing
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Balanced CD Reduction and penetration.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

recommendmasterplan.name: KUSH
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Prodigal son and genius swordsman of House Baroque.

assist.desc: Lancelot works well with heroes who can pull enemies together, like Atlas and Tigreal, because they allow him to hit more enemies with his AOE skills.

strong.desc: Lancelot counters long-range Mages, such as Cecilion and Pharsa, because there is a delay to their skills and Lancelot can use his 1st Skill to dodge them while going in for the kill.

weak.desc: Lancelot is weak against heroes who can counter his mobility like Minsitthar and Phoveus, as his 1st Skill and Ultimate will be heavily restricted.
